alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Roger Mills; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 8:12PM CDT until May 10 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ellis County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Southwestern Harper County in northwestern Oklahoma... West central Woodward County in northwestern Oklahoma... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 812 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of May to 5 miles northwest of Higgins to 4 miles northeast of Lake Marvin to 10 miles northwest of Allison, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shattuck, Arnett, Gage, Fargo, Fort Supply, May, Crawford, Roll, Durham and Catesby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
